title: Squeezr - Local Image Compression
shortDescription: Share images from any app, adjust scale and size locally, and save or reshare optimized results. Built with Kotlin, MVVM, WorkManager, Coroutines, Intents, and Coil for a smooth and reliable Android experience.
detailedDescription:
Built a lightweight, `privacy-focused` image compression utility that works entirely `on-device` without uploading images to any server. Users can share images from any app, adjust compression settings, and instantly save or reshare optimized versions - all with a smooth, `native Android` experience.

üö© **What problem it solves**
Users frequently need to compress images for:
- Sharing on messaging apps with file size limits
- Reducing storage usage on device
- Faster uploads on slow connections
- Email attachments with size restrictions

Most compression tools are web-based (privacy concerns) or bloated with ads. Squeezr provides a fast, `ad-free`, `offline` solution that integrates seamlessly with Android's share system.

üõ†Ô∏è **My Contributions**
- `Designed and developed` the complete application from scratch
- Implemented `Android Share Intent` receiver for seamless integration with any app
- Built `real-time preview` system showing compression results before saving
- Created adjustable scale and quality controls with live file size estimation
- Integrated `WorkManager` for `reliable background processing` of large images
- Used `Coroutines` for `async image processing` without blocking the UI
- Implemented `Coil` for `efficient image loading` and memory management
- Built re-share functionality to instantly send compressed images to other apps
- Applied `MVVM architecture` for clean, `testable` code structure
- Designed intuitive UI following `Material Design` guidelines

‚öôÔ∏è **Technical Highlights**
**Image Processing Pipeline:**
- `Bitmap` manipulation with configurable quality and scale factors
- `Efficient memory handling` to prevent OOM on large images
- Real-time compression ratio and file size calculations
- Support for multiple image formats (JPEG, PNG, WebP)

**Android Integration:**
- `Share Intent` receiver for incoming images from any app
- `Share Intent` sender for re-sharing compressed results
- `Content Provider` integration for secure file access
- Proper `URI handling` for scoped storage compatibility

**Background Processing:**
- `WorkManager` for guaranteed task completion
- `Coroutines` with proper `Dispatchers` for non-blocking operations
- Progress tracking and cancellation support
- `Lifecycle-aware` processing to prevent memory leaks

**Performance & UX:**
- `Coil` image loader with `caching` and `memory optimization`
- Instant preview updates as settings change
- Smooth animations and responsive controls
- `Minimal APK size` for quick installation

- `100% offline` - no data leaves the device
- `Privacy-first` - no analytics or tracking
- Demonstrates `Android system integration` skills (Intents, Content Providers)

- `Real-world utility` app solving everyday user problems
